statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.name) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.uid , AA.type , AA.grade , AA.name , AA.recommend , AA.sv_start_date , AA.sv_end_date , AA.cp_address , AA.president_name , AA.cp_crn , AA.cp_email , AA.cp_homepage , AA.cp_intro , AA.cp_tel , AA.ct_department , AA.ct_email , AA.ct_fax , AA.ct_hphone , AA.ct_name , AA.ct_position , AA.ct_tel , AA.consultation , AA.using_price , AA.image , AA.image_width , AA.image_height
, M1.Name as type_name , M2.Name as grade_name
, AA.ApiRequestID , M3.Name as ApiType , M4.Name as Status , BB.RequestDate
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsAgency AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TApiRequest BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ApiRequestID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.type = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'SmapsAgencyType' LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.grade = M2.Code AND M2.ParentCode = 'SmapsAgencyGrade' LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M3 WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.ApiType = M3.Code AND M3.ParentCode = 'ApiType' LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M4 WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.Status = M4.Code AND M4.ParentCode = 'ApiStatus' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.RequestID = #RequestID#
AND ( AA.name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' OR AA.ct_name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsAgency AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsAgency AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.uid = #uid#

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
